questions.text: What is Hello Kitty's full name?
In what city was Hello Kitty born (in the fictional universe)?
Which character is known for their distinctive pink rabbit hood?
What type of animal is Pompompurin?
What is the name of Hello Kitty's twin sister?
Which Sanrio character is a mischievous rabbit with a black jester's hat?
Cinnamoroll is a puppy with what kind of special ability?
options: He can fly with his large ears.
He can talk to other animals.
questions.answer: He can fly with his large ears.

questions.text: What animal is the character Keroppi?
What is the name of the lazy egg yolk character from Sanrio?
Badtz-Maru is what type of animal?
The Little Twin Stars are named Kiki and...?
What is Aggretsuko's main passion, which helps her release her anger?
What distinguishing feature helps you tell Hello Kitty apart from her twin sister Mimmy?
options: Hello Kitty has a red bow, and Mimmy has a yellow one.
Hello Kitty wears a blue dress, and Mimmy wears a pink one.
Hello Kitty has blue eyes, and Mimmy has black eyes.
questions.answer: Hello Kitty has a red bow, and Mimmy has a yellow one.

questions.text: What year was the Hello Kitty character first introduced?
Chococat is a black cat with what key feature?
options: Large ears that are always perked up
